ModMetaData.name: [Dead mod update] Many More Words
ModMetaData.author: Melack2
ModMetaData.description:
[center][size=20pt]HEAD[/size][/center]
[color=orange][size=18pt]Description:[/size][/color] A mod that adds more randomly generated words, such as names,artwork titles, and more.
[color=orange][b]Description 2[/b][/color] I have gone into all of the xml folders and increaced most if not all generators. I still need synonyms for lake and island though, and be on the look out for grammer and spelling errors. I still need to do Royalty DLC. [color=orange][size=18pt] Translate?[/size][/color] If you would like to translate let me know. I have no idea how through, so your on your own.
[color=orange][size=18pt]Permissions and Stuff[/size][/color] ummm...so I really don't know if I can copywrite, it's literally just a list of words. But I do have this rule: Use as much of this as you want BUT you can't just copy and paste the folder. You must work for it like I did :D .
